attributes.additional_details:
These are the safest drugs out there, safer than alcohol, tobacco and even cannabis.
Neither of these drugs are addictive, no links to brain damage and there is no serious long term risks.

All that happens is you take it, get high for around 10 hours and the effects are gone, you either cant take it again any time soon or you need to take more because of the tolerance your body builds.

LSD and magic mushrooms have medical benefits.

When you take this you explore your brain and learn a lot more about yourself and life and there is no reason why this should be illegal.
